lead_paragraph: Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko on Monday sent a letter to the International Association of Athletics Federations, asking it to allow honest Russian track-and-field athletes to take part in the Rio Olympics, the R-Sport news agency reported.

headline.print_headline: Russia to IAAF-Lift Ban on 'Clean' Athletes Competing in Rio: R-Sport
headline.main: Russia to IAAF-Lift Ban on 'Clean' Athletes Competing in Rio: R-Sport

snippet: Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko on Monday sent a letter to the International Association of Athletics Federations, asking it to allow honest Russian track-and-field athletes to take part in the Rio Olympics, the R-Sport news agency reported....
